Author: BlueGoldico
Title: [ANN][ICO] BlueGold – Blockchain Cruises & Events
Body: https://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2018/26/1/1529938185-banniere.png     BlueGold - Blockchain Cruises & Events     Website : https://bluegold.io/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/CruisesEvents GitHub: https://github.com/BlueGold-ICO Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/bluegold-blockchain-cruises-events/ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BlueGold-Blockchain-Cruises-Events-603075650063033/ Bounty campaign: https://bluegold.io/index.php/bounty/ YouTube: https://youtu.be/D4dO_UnLw_8 Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/BlueGold-ICO Medium: https://medium.com/@BlueGold Telegram : https://t.me/joinchat/AAAAAEtn5RHYY5k0GGxf2Q     BlueGold wants to become the next reference currency for Blockchain events. In the spirit of the Blockchain freedom and independence, BlueGold offers cruises dedicated to the crypto-universe. These cruises are designed to be a springboard for [Suspicious link removed]munity, from key note speakers, media, ICO teams to potential investors hoping for a content-driven place to meet.    Background   Launched by a former merchant navy captain and now crypto-autodidact Régis Revilliod, BlueGold is designed for the organisation of qualitative cruises events towards the Blockchain family or simply newcomers to crypto. Exchange platforms, specialised media, ICO partners, listing and rating sites, Blockchain specialists and crypto- enthusiasts are true actors of this BlueGold ICO.  A total of 100,000,000 BlueGolds are issued as part of the BlueGold ICO. Any unsold BlueGold will be burnt. The BlueGold emission will be structured in two parts, starting with the Pre-Sale and followed by the Main Sale. The sale price for BlueGold during the BlueGold Sale is fixed at 1 USD = 1 BlueGold. Special discounts may apply during Pre-Sale.    Our Philosophy   The Blockchain was formed with a desire for transparency and independence. Far from traditional systems of financing and project development, freedom of enterprise and the spreading of new ideas constitute the foundation of the [Suspicious link removed]munity. BlueGold ICO wants to keep these strong principles, away from financial influences and intermediaries, so that the Blockchain can long thrive.     BlueGold Deployment   The ultimate goal is to Pre-Sale and organise 4 cruises a year. Commercial actions will focus on sponsor and partner prospections as per the Blockchain cruise organisation. Marketing will handle journey planification with the list of ports of call and potential mainland events to organise once the ship stays at berth. Our technical teams will be in charge of developing the website for booking and BlueGold transactions.     Token Distribution                                                   BlueGold Deployment  https://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2018/26/1/1529938225-graph.png    Bounty & Airdrop campaigns to be announced shortly.  More info on our website: www.bluegold.io    Twitter: https://twitter.com/CruisesEvents GitHub: https://github.com/BlueGold-ICO Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/bluegold-blockchain-cruises-events/ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BlueGold-Blockchain-Cruises-Events-603075650063033/ Bounty campaign: https://bluegold.io/index.php/bounty/ YouTube: https://youtu.be/D4dO_UnLw_8 Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/BlueGold-ICO Medium: https://medium.com/@BlueGold Telegram : https://t.me/joinchat/AAAAAEtn5RHYY5k0GGxf2Q

Author: BlueGoldico
Title: [ANN][ICO] BlueGold – Blockchain Cruises & Events
Body: Thanks for your comment and your advice! We need to share more about BlueGold of course.  100,000,000 BlueGold is indeed for Pre-Sale and Main sale. You can have access to the split on our site if you want to: bluegold.io.  BlueGold is not only a coin to participate in the dedication of an entire cruise ship for blockchain exchanges and conferences. Suites, rooms, participation in conferences or debates regarding blockchain topics and new ICO to come will be accessible thanks to BlueGold.
